channel.title: [HELP]\/Making SMF Fourms?\/[HELP]
channel.description:
ok so i'm not very good at making fourms, but i'm trying to fourms like moparscape has..i was wondering if anybody new a tutorial, on how to make the things these forums have. such as:
The Moderator thing the staff thing and stuff like that..i wanted to know if anybody knew how to make stuff like that? all help is welcome than ks ;)

If you know how to torrent I’d recommend Photoshop (I won’t explain how). Also, other free programs such as GIMP (Graphical Image Manipulation Program)

item.title: [HELP]\/Making SMF Fourms?\/[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“Pimping One, post:2, topic:287764”][quote author=ModAssassin link=topic=380435.msg2859948#msg2859948 date=1247100193]
ok so i’m not very good at making fourms, but i’m trying to fourms like moparscape has…i was wondering if anybody new a tutorial, on how to make the things these forums have. such as:

The Moderator thing
the staff thing
and stuff like that…i wanted to know if anybody knew how to make stuff like that? all help is welcome than ks
[/quote]Alright, Well you need a host I suggest someone like http://visyhost.com/ and you need to get SMF well, Moparscape has the default SMF theme. To install it, you upload it via FTP unzip it. or Unzip it then upload it go to www.yourdomain.com and it should bring you to the installer.php enter in your mysql info and your done :).

EDIT: If this was to much trouble to understand

http://www.google.com/search?q=how+to+install+smf&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a[/quote]

ye ye i got all that stuff, but like you know how moparscape has like moderators, and staff symbols? modeled by the thing that says staff, has the stars, and has the pictures of pokemon…how do u do that?

Read full topic
